mapper.select: SELECT * FROM event where device_number = #{deviceNumber} ORDER BY GMT_CREATE DESC
SELECT * FROM event where device_number = #{deviceNum} AND GMT_MODIFIED = (select MAX(GMT_MODIFIED) from event where device_number=#{deviceNum})
SELECT * FROM event_interaction_time where device_number = #{deviceNum} AND GMT_MODIFIED = (select MAX(GMT_MODIFIED) from event_interaction_time where device_number=#{deviceNum})
SELECT * FROM event WHERE is_expire = '1' and device_number = #{deviceNumber} ORDER BY GMT_CREATE DESC

SELECT DISTINCT e.EVENT_EXTEND,count (e.EVENT_EXTEND) as eventCount,rank () over ( ORDER BY e.EVENT_EXTEND asc ) AS rank FROM event e
and trunc(e.GMT_CREATE) >= TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'） and trunc(e.GMT_CREATE) <= TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'）
and e.DEVICE_NUMBER IN ( SELECT eit.DEVICE_NUMBER FROM EVENT_INTERACTION_TIME eit WHERE eit.ADSCRIPTION_CITY = #{adscriptionCity} ) and e.EVENT_CODE IN （ '9', '10', '11'） AND e.EVENT_EXTEND LIKE #{eventCode}
GROUP BY EVENT_EXTEND

SELECT DISTINCT e.EVENT_EXTEND,e.EVENT_EXTEND_EXTRA1,count (e.EVENT_EXTEND) as eventCount,rank () over ( ORDER BY e.EVENT_EXTEND asc ) AS rank FROM event e
and trunc(e.GMT_CREATE) >= TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'） and trunc(e.GMT_CREATE) <= TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'）
and e.DEVICE_NUMBER IN ( SELECT eit.DEVICE_NUMBER FROM EVENT_INTERACTION_TIME eit WHERE eit.ADSCRIPTION_CITY = #{adscriptionCity} ) and e.EVENT_CODE = '2'
GROUP BY EVENT_EXTEND,EVENT_EXTEND_EXTRA1
